mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(post_id, user_id, content, create_time, parent_id) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW(), #{parentId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, post_id, user_id, content, create_time, vote_count AS voteCount, parent_id FROM comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY create_time ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET vote_count = COALESCE(vote_count, 0) + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT *, vote_count AS voteCount FROM comment WHERE id = #{id}
